website_summaries.verdict: Both reliable and affordable, and a good choice if you are looking for insect trap that works well at catching bugs and doesn't cost a lot.
pros: An affordable trap that works indoors and outdoors by attracting mosquitoes and other flying insects with its soft LED light
Has an energy-saving daytime mode and USB port
It's quiet, effective, and easy to use and clean
cons: The manufacturer recommends caution with small children around the unit's fan

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I let it run 24/7
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I let it run 24/7. At night, I turn off all lights so the only light on is the trap. We live in North Texas countryside and have twin 2 year olds that leave the door open letting in 20+ mosquitoes a day. With just the one trap, I’d say we catch 90% of the mosquitoes. I’d recommend 1 per large room if you have the same problem I do. Attached photo is a typical 24 hour catch.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Morse

customer_reviews.title: The review is pretty good. We went to her house for BBQ ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend in NJ. The review is pretty good. We went to her house for BBQ last week and I helped set it up. This unit is light and small. NJ weather is really unpredictable, overnight spring is here, so is weed and bugs! Mosquito and bugs always a bother when you stayed outside. The unit is very quiet and the LED light is good after dark. We put by the door in case any bugs will fly in when everyone in and out the door. We did not get any mosquito but 3 small moths. I believe the light will attract flying bugs and mosquito.
customer_reviews.author: I P T

customer_reviews.title: Finally, don’t have to spray
customer_reviews.text: All members in my family attract bugs/mosquitoes. glad to purchase this light for our Hawaii trip and it worked great. The number of bites we got are much less than expected. The light is soft at night . Can’t wait to use for our upcoming camping trip
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Misquoto lamp works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I always get bit up by misquotes when we go to the U.P. ( Hessel , MI) I came across this!! I bought two and put one in each bedroom. These cabins are small but two was enough to get the guys... I did not get bit by any misquotes!!! I am so amazed by this product!!! I highly recommend this!!! The blue light is bright but was able to sleep as it reminded me of a night light... But as for getting those pesky bugs they worked....
customer_reviews.author: Heather Fulwiler

customer_reviews.title: Living near a body of water and Ohio we definitely know mosquitos and with this we are able to go out and not have to worry about caking on bug spray which is awesome for us since my little girl's skin gets irritated
customer_reviews.text: The size of this machine will make you doubt it's capabilities but don't! It takes barely any room up but works so well at deterring mosquitos. Living near a body of water and Ohio we definitely know mosquitos and with this we are able to go out and not have to worry about caking on bug spray which is awesome for us since my little girl's skin gets irritated. It emits a non jarring light around so you don't even need an additional light! Thank you for this perfect solution!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for inside our camper and it worked well. The fan is quiet and it caught mosquitoes and other bugs. Bugs may still be alive when you empty it, so be sure to empty it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Sconi

customer_reviews.title: Its works just fine for what I am needing
customer_reviews.text: Mostly use in our kitchen which is right by the back door. We have kids and dogs going in and out all evening leaving opportunity for mosquitoes, moths and flies. So far, I have no complaints on this item. Its works just fine for what I am needing. Kinda funny to see a bug get zapped when the dog is near the light freaks the dog out and he won’t stop barking at it (LOL) . Our kids do take outside by the bonfire when the mosquitoes are out and are biting them despite all the smoke from the fire. Downside to that ...... We have to pull out the very long extension cord so it has power.
customer_reviews.author: Glorybound68

customer_reviews.title: Hoping this product functions well
customer_reviews.text: I had a bunch of indoor mosquitoes before this item arrived. It hasn't caught any flying insects yet, I've had it about a week. The mosquitoes had disappeared before it came, which I am happy about, but as a result I'm not sure how well this product functions. I'll continue to use because I was being eaten alive. Will be curious to see if it catches any other flying pests.
customer_reviews.author: Enlightened Reader

customer_reviews.title: It's worked great. I checked the trap the other day and ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a creek behind our house and have major mosquito problems. I bought this hoping it would help us to cut down on the number of mosquitoes bites we were getting during the summer. It's worked great. I checked the trap the other day and it was surprisingly full. I also like how quiet it is and that it's chemical free.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa Glover

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe this really did anything... till I decided to pop it open one day.... found all kinds of different kinds of bugs LOL. Mosquitoes, fruit flies, big flies, moths, I mean what the heck? I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use. you only need to plug in to the outlet. The storage container is easy to take off. I almost cannot hear the fan noise. Now this equipment is ready to kill the mosquito!
customer_reviews.author: Yun Lian

customer_reviews.title: Inside our apartment it is perfect, not noisy like the big ones
customer_reviews.text: Inside our apartment it is perfect, not noisy like the big ones. I turn off the TV and other lights in the rooms and by morning there are fly carcasses stuck to the grid wires. Mosquitoes also. Had to unscrew it to clean though.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was a really bad CHEAP PLASTIC product. The fan stopped working after just a few days. Not worth the effort. Didn't work. Waste of money. Got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Moo

customer_reviews.title: Love it, I have been fighting the Mosquito war ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I have been fighting the Mosquito war here do to the Rainy Season, Hawaii. Also, my neighbor have some junk stuff in her yard and with the rain, it breeds the Devils. I check every day and most times it has some of those devils in there to remove, better dead than biting me or my family.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Ethridge

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, simple as that. My back porch backs up to a river that is surrounded by woods, so if you could only imagine how uncomfortable it is to be outside for more than 5 minutes...and even then I get bitten up! Keeping this near me while enjoying my back yard is great! Its great to know that the little bugs are getting zapped, too...and will never be able to suck my blood again!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Wechsler

customer_reviews.title: This little bugger is awesome. I live in Texas and you know how ...
customer_reviews.text: This little bugger is awesome. I live in Texas and you know how they say everything is bigger in Texas? They aren't lying! The mosquitoes are crazy big and there are so many of them! This little machine keeps them away from my daughter when she is outside in the back yard. It isn't very loud and it is very effective! I'm going to purchase another for our lake house!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Glover

customer_reviews.title: I hate mosquitoes! I am so happy I have this ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time ,I bought this mosquito trap for use in the basement and garage ! Also want to use this during the camping night in the park ! one time a mosquito bite my daughter's face and left a scar,I hate mosquitoes ! I am so happy I have this mosquito killer ! Not worry anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Still bugged by bugs.
customer_reviews.text: I have used indoors and in my breezeway. Zero results inside. Outdoors I have caught some millers and assorted other flying insects (some are dead, others not), but very few mosquitoes (maybe two or three every couple days). Considering return to get my money back. Mostly ineffective on mosquitoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Chenault

customer_reviews.title: Not a good first impression.
customer_reviews.text: Initial impression... I have had this product for less than a day now. The red button on the side is suppose to dim the light for nighttime use. It worked to toggle the bulbs from medium light to low light for the first two times I pressed it. An hour later, I pushed the red button again to dim the light and it will only stay on the medium bright setting - it will not dim. So I’m hiding it behind a plant while I sleep. Does it work... I’ll update my post.
customer_reviews.author: coolbreezesd

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I keep it next to the bed
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I keep it next to the bed, and have not been bitten since I plugged it in. It’s quiet hummmmm lulls me to sleep and I awake refreshed and ready to go! BUY it- you’ll LIKE it!😵
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I use my deck as a party place extension, mosquitoes had always been a problem which bothers me. this device looks great quality, and I'm very impressed. It's not hot season yet but I am preparing it for preventing it when the season comes
customer_reviews.author: juding dan

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but it works! My son is constantly getting bit by mosquitos and he swells up really big, we also have a small pet in his room so I can't use chemicals this works perfectly. Didn't catch anything right away but definitely did and no bites since.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Should not be marketed to catch mosquitos.  It doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: It does NOT catch mosquitos. In fact, the mosquitos (if even caught) could go right out one of the holes in the bottom. Mosquitos do not respond to blacklights. They only act on scents and heat. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Locksheon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work. I have tried everything with this product in the hopes that it would kill these mosquitoes, but at this point, I am returning this product. It was TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: AddyBC

customer_reviews.title: works pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: I use it indoors to get that one or two annoying skeeters that bug you in the middle of the night. So, while I haven't caught a ton of bugs, the few that I have caught made all the difference for sleeping without attacks. :-) smaller than a loaf of bread, so indoors is okay. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: northern MN

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much useless
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the mosquitoes in Utah are just immune to this light, but I literally caught 3 mosquitoes the 2 weeks that I used this thing. Pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Let's go green!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaii, so as you can imagine, mosquitoes are fierce! It's a nice investment, as this is more expensive than traditional mosquito sprays. But it does the work, and it is totally green! The blue light is great for night use, and I feel like I can finally go to bed without worrying about itchy skin for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I give it a one because although it did attract ...
customer_reviews.text: I give it a one because although it did attract mosquitoes, they didn't fly to it. They bit me instead.
customer_reviews.author: seefoo

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure the mosquito trap works. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure the mosquito trap works. I put it in my room and i didn't see any bug or flies in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dumas

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't catch mosquitoes
customer_reviews.text: Left it on for several hours outside and it didn't catch a single mosquito or any other bug for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well got 5 mosquito in 3 days already
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty good, it looks very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Buy this mosquito lamp is mainly used for mosquitoes at night to sleep. Looks pretty good, it looks very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: skycityhd

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It does not catch mosquitoes. It does catch small moths and miscellaneous insects.
customer_reviews.author: Twintastic

customer_reviews.title: Nats are better than nothing! Lol
customer_reviews.text: I just emptied it for the first time since I've bought it. I have it on the nightstand by my bed. All I've seen were nats.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I put it out in garage, and it has ...
customer_reviews.text: I put it out in garage, and it has caught a lot of bugs; however, it is still not pleasant to sit outside near garage opening, where this lamp sits, without bugs bugging us.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheaply made and weak fan
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with a couple bad bulbs. Its quiet enough, but it also has very little suction power.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Spadowski

customer_reviews.title: Product does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions placed the unit in the dark in several different rooms all indoors. Ran it continuously for five days. Not one mosquito caught. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jaxin

customer_reviews.title: Use inside.
customer_reviews.text: Hasn’t killed a bug yet. Hard to judge how effective it is now...
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. However, it also draws in ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. However, it also draws in much larger insects that get stuck and are difficult to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal B

customer_reviews.title: our city been flood really bad a mosquito population raising dramatically
customer_reviews.text: not working, our city been flood really bad a mosquito population raising dramatically. our home are fill with mosquito as well. so order this hope it will help catch those blood sucker . setting it out for four night and caught zero mosquito. but getting bite by those blood sucker non stop. this not working at all. don't know where those positive review come from.. please be aware don't wast your money on this unit.
customer_reviews.author: T from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a loop on top so we can hang it. Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Judy L

customer_reviews.title: You can tell that this product was not made in ...
customer_reviews.text: You can tell that this product was not made in America or at least by a company that uses English as it's first language as the instructions can be quite confusing upon opening it. The product itself feels moderately cheap but you are getting what you pay for. We have not used this inside but instead we have used this outside and after a few days of use it does seem to still grab up quite a few bugs. For some context we live in an apartment building and put this out on our porch.
customer_reviews.author: Dans Tech Check

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: Only works with all surrounding lights turned off. Mosquitos either don't stay in the cage or they don't fly into it in first place. It catches bugs but not great:/
customer_reviews.author: Bradford C.

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised. but the red power button is ...
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised. but the red power button is faulty so I can't turn it on or off. I have to just unplug the power.
customer_reviews.author: e2

customer_reviews.title: Attracts mostly moths
customer_reviews.text: Ok, but attracts mostly moths. Doesn't seem to cover as much area as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Mosquitoes are still biting. Have not found a single one in the trap after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Edoardo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work. It is open so the bugs don't get trapped.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this. I turned on this for several days ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. I would not recommend this. I turned on this for several days as the direction. Unfortunately just found five mosquito bites.
customer_reviews.author: SUjinJeong

customer_reviews.title: N9t sure if its for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted it for outdoor use on our patio. The instructions basically says its for indoor use when the description says indoor/outdoor use. I'm not really sure how edge to be it is outdoors. The only thing in it was a moth. It surely attracts the ants though! Will have to work with it longer to see any real results.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Baby saver
customer_reviews.text: It is sooooo excellent ! Mosquitoes love all my family. It just save our lives lol. Especially for my baby, it works much better than our old one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some things are just that
customer_reviews.text: Should have saved my money, and just purchased some spray. I was very disappointed with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

product_meta.title: RockBirds Mosquito Killer and Bug Zapper, Rockbirds Indoor Electric Fly Trap, Killer Mosquitoes & Bug by LED Light and Non-radiative, Black
feature_bullets: EFFECTIVE MOSQUITO KILLER: RockBirds Mosquito Trap works more effective with MOSQUITO ATTRACTANT (NOT INCLUDED),you can simply buy it on Amazon and put it at the bottom of Mosquito Trap, it will workgreat to attract mosquitoes and other pests to fly into Mosquito Trap ,so you can enjoy the outdoors.
HELP YOU SLEEP BETTER: Just turn on the mosquito trap 3 hours before you go to sleep. Virtually silent fan is perfect for baby, toddlers and the pregnant.

COMPACT AND LIGHTWEIGHT: Easy to carry and place the bug zapper in the living room, kitchen, bedroom, basement, closed garage, restaurant, store, office, hospital or any outdoor closed space. The insect zapper is equipped with a detachable bottom with a twist which can be easily removed for cleaning and bug disposal.
EASY TO USE- Instantaneous operation, just switch on power, you can get a continuous and uninterrupted service, sleeping well all the nights; rotating the trap box, you can release the dead mosquito
DUAL MODES- It have two modes-manual and automatic: Just press the button and change it when in darkness,no electric shock.
